text: well I just had the opportunity to have
an excellent conversation with
president-elect ruck
it was wide-ranging we talked about some
of the organizational issues in setting
up a White House we've talked about
foreign policy to talk about domestic
policy and as I said last night my
number one priority in the coming two
months is to try to facilitate a
transition that ensures our
president-elect is successful and I have
been very hurt by the big interest in
front of president-elect Trump's wanting
to work with my team around many of the
issues that this great country faces and
I believe that it is important for all
of us regardless of party and regardless
of political preferences to now come
together work together to deal with the
many challenges that we face and in the
meantime Michelle has had a chance to
read the incoming first lady and
an excellent conversation with her as
well and we want to make sure that they
feel welcome as they prepare to make
this transition most of all I want to
emphasize to you this president-elect
that we now are going to do everything
we can to help you succeed because it's
easy to member countries well thank you
very much for everything again this was
a meeting that was going to last when we
become
just gonna get to know each other we had
never met each other I have great
respect the meeting lasted for almost an
hour and a half and it could have as far
as I'm concerned it could have gone in
for a lot longer we really we discussed
a lot of different situations some
wonderful and some typically I very much
look forward to dearly to the president
in the future including counsel he's
explained some of the difficulties some
of the the high-flying and some
of the some of the really great things
that have been achieved
so mr. president it was a great honor
being with you and I look forward to
being with you many many more time
